languages.text: {n}Озадаченный голос Мастера вокса отрывает вас от дел.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, прошу прощения, ко мне только что поступило срочное донесение. В грузовом отсеке 73-G появился странный... груз, если его можно так назвать. Матросы хотели от него избавиться, но не решились этого сделать без вашего прямого приказа".

{n}The Vox Master's puzzled voice distracts you from your duties.{/n} "My apologies, Lord Captain, but I have just been delivered an urgent report. Cargo Bay 73-G has received some unusual... cargo, if one can call it that. The crew considered disposing of it, but did not dare to do so without your direct order."
languages.original_text: {n}Озадаченный голос Мастера вокса отрывает вас от дел.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, прошу прощения, ко мне только что поступило срочное донесение. В грузовом отсеке 73-G появился странный... груз, если его можно так назвать. Матросы хотели от него избавиться, но не решились этого сделать без вашего прямого приказа".

traits.locale_text: {n}A dumbfounded Vox Master's voice distracts you from your task.{/n} "Lord Captain, I'm sorry, but I have just received an urgent report. The cargo section 73-G contains a strange... item, if I may call it this way. Crewmen wanted to dispose of it, but didn't dare to without your direct order."

{n}A dumbfounded Vox Master's voice distracts you from your task.{/n} "Lord Captain, I'm sorry, but I have just received an urgent report. The cargo section 73-G contains a strange... item, if I may call it this way. Crewmen wanted to dispose of it, but didn't dare to without your direct order."

{n}A puzzled voice belonging to the Vox Master distracts you from your task.{/n} "Lord Captain, I apologise, but I have just received an urgent report. The cargo section 73-G contains strange... cargo, if I may call it that. The crew wanted to dispose of it, but didn't dare to without your direct order."

{n}A puzzled voice belonging to the Vox Master distracts you from your task.{/n} "Lord Captain, I apologise, but I have just received an urgent report. The cargo section 73-G contains strange... cargo, if I may call it that. The crew wanted to dispose of it, but didn't dare to without your direct order."

{n}The Vox Master's puzzled voice distracts you from your duties.{/n} "My apologies, Lord Captain, but I have just been delivered an urgent report. Cargo Bay 73-G has received some unusual... cargo, if one can call it that. The crew considered disposing of it, but did not dare to do so without your direct order."

languages.text: {n}音阵大师困惑的声音吸引了你的注意力。{/n}“舰长大人，我很抱歉，但我刚刚收到一份紧急报告，说73-G号货舱里有古怪的……货物，如果这算得上‘货物’的话。船员们本打算把它处理掉，但没有您的直接命令，他们不敢轻举妄动。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's puzzled voice distracts you from your duties.{/n} "My apologies, Lord Captain, but I have just been delivered an urgent report. Cargo Bay 73-G has received some unusual... cargo, if one can call it that. The crew considered disposing of it, but did not dare to do so without your direct order."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵大师困惑的声音吸引了你的注意力。{/n}“舰长大人，我很抱歉，但我刚刚收到一份紧急报告，说73-G号货舱里有古怪的……货物，如果这算得上‘货物’的话。船员们本打算把它处理掉，但没有您的直接命令，他们不敢轻举妄动。”

languages.text: {n}La voix perplexe de la maîtresse-vox vous interrompt dans votre tâche.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi cette interruption, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je viens de recevoir un rapport urgent. La baie de chargement 73-G a réceptionné une... cargaison des plus inhabituelles, si l'on peut dire. L'équipage a songé à s'en débarrasser, mais n'a pas osé le faire sans un ordre direct de votre part. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's puzzled voice distracts you from your duties.{/n} "My apologies, Lord Captain, but I have just been delivered an urgent report. Cargo Bay 73-G has received some unusual... cargo, if one can call it that. The crew considered disposing of it, but did not dare to do so without your direct order."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix perplexe de la maîtresse-vox vous interrompt dans votre tâche.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi cette interruption, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je viens de recevoir un rapport urgent. La baie de chargement 73-G a réceptionné une... cargaison des plus inhabituelles, si l'on peut dire. L'équipage a songé à s'en débarrasser, mais n'a pas osé le faire sans un ordre direct de votre part. »

languages.text: {n}Die verwirrte Stimme der Voxmeisterin lenkt dich von deinen Pflichten ab.{/n} "Verzeiht, Lord Captain, aber mir wurde gerade ein wichtiger Bericht überbracht. Frachtmodul 73-G hat ungewöhnliche ... Fracht empfangen, wenn man das so nennen kann. Die Crew wollte sie schon entsorgen, wagte das aber nicht ohne Euren direkten Befehl."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's puzzled voice distracts you from your duties.{/n} "My apologies, Lord Captain, but I have just been delivered an urgent report. Cargo Bay 73-G has received some unusual... cargo, if one can call it that. The crew considered disposing of it, but did not dare to do so without your direct order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die verwirrte Stimme der Voxmeisterin lenkt dich von deinen Pflichten ab.{/n} "Verzeiht, Lord Captain, aber mir wurde gerade ein wichtiger Bericht überbracht. Frachtmodul 73-G hat ungewöhnliche ... Fracht empfangen, wenn man das so nennen kann. Die Crew wollte sie schon entsorgen, wagte das aber nicht ohne Euren direkten Befehl."

languages.text: {n}La voz confusa de la maestra de vocos te distrae de tus tareas.{/n} «Perdone que l{mf|e|a} interrumpa, Lord Capitán, pero acabo de recibir un informe urgente. La bodega de carga 73-G ha recibido un... cargamento singular, por llamarlo de alguna manera. La tripulación se estaba planteando deshacerse de él, pero no se atreven sin una orden directa».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's puzzled voice distracts you from your duties.{/n} "My apologies, Lord Captain, but I have just been delivered an urgent report. Cargo Bay 73-G has received some unusual... cargo, if one can call it that. The crew considered disposing of it, but did not dare to do so without your direct order."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz confusa de la maestra de vocos te distrae de tus tareas.{/n} «Perdone que l{mf|e|a} interrumpa, Lord Capitán, pero acabo de recibir un informe urgente. La bodega de carga 73-G ha recibido un... cargamento singular, por llamarlo de alguna manera. La tripulación se estaba planteando deshacerse de él, pero no se atreven sin una orden directa».

languages.text: {n}ヴォクス・マスターの困惑した声が、あなたの気をそらした。{/n}「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。緊急の報告が入りました。貨物室73-Gに、珍しい…貨物が入ったそうです。クルーはそれを処分しようとしましたが、あなたの命令なしに執行するわけにはいきません」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's puzzled voice distracts you from your duties.{/n} "My apologies, Lord Captain, but I have just been delivered an urgent report. Cargo Bay 73-G has received some unusual... cargo, if one can call it that. The crew considered disposing of it, but did not dare to do so without your direct order."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクス・マスターの困惑した声が、あなたの気をそらした。{/n}「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。緊急の報告が入りました。貨物室73-Gに、珍しい…貨物が入ったそうです。クルーはそれを処分しようとしましたが、あなたの命令なしに執行するわけにはいきません」

languages.text: {n}Voks Üstadı'nın şaşkın ses tonu, dikkatini vazifenden çekip alıyor.{/n} "Bağışlayın Lord Kaptan lakin acil bir rapor aldım. Kargo Bölmesi 73-G, sıra dışı bir... Kargo teslim almış, öyle denebilirse tabii. Mürettebat, imha etmeyi düşünmüş ancak doğrudan emriniz olmaksızın böyle bir işe kalkışmak istememişler."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master's puzzled voice distracts you from your duties.{/n} "My apologies, Lord Captain, but I have just been delivered an urgent report. Cargo Bay 73-G has received some unusual... cargo, if one can call it that. The crew considered disposing of it, but did not dare to do so without your direct order."
